    • Method Detail

      • addToScore

        public void addToScore(int amount)
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to be added to the total. The amount added will be the amount multiplied by the current multiplier
        Postcondition:
        the total is increased by amount * multiplier

      • decrementLife

        public void decrementLife()
        Postcondition:
        decreases the life of the player

      • resetValues

        public void resetValues()
        Postcondition:
        sets the total to 0 and the multiplier to 0

      • incrementMultiplier

        public void incrementMultiplier()
        Postcondition:
        adds one to the current multiplier

      • resetMultiplier

        public void resetMultiplier()
        Postcondition:
        the multiplier is equal to 0

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()

      • calcPercentage

        public double calcPercentage()
        Returns:
        the percentage of the total points at that time that the player has gotten. For example, after 3 CircleBeats, the maximum score is 1800. If the player has scored 300, 100, and 50 (in that order, and without reseting his multiplier), he would have 650 points, and this would return 36.11%.

      • getMultiplier

        public int getMultiplier()

      • getMaxMult

        public int getMaxMult()

      • getThrees

      • getMisses

        public int getMisses()

      • getLife

        public double getLife()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Postcondition:
        resets the score to its default values

      • calcGrade

        public java.lang.String calcGrade()
        Returns:
        the grade the player received.
